content.query:
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO

CREATE TABLE [dbo].[access_z309_tmeterreading_hash]
( 
	[N_PROP] [varchar](100)  NULL,
	[N_PROP_METE] [varchar](100)  NULL,
	[N_METE_READ] [varchar](100)  NULL,
	[C_METE_READ_TOLE] [varchar](100)  NULL,
	[C_METE_READ_TYPE] [varchar](100)  NULL,
	[C_METE_READ_CONS] [varchar](100)  NULL,
	[C_METE_READ_STAT] [varchar](100)  NULL,
	[C_METE_CANT_READ] [varchar](100)  NULL,
	[C_PDE_READ_METH] [varchar](100)  NULL,
	[Q_METE_READ] [varchar](100)  NULL,
	[D_METE_READ] [varchar](100)  NULL,
	[T_METE_READ_TIME] [varchar](100)  NULL,
	[Q_METE_READ_CONS] [varchar](100)  NULL,
	[Q_METE_READ_DAYS] [varchar](100)  NULL,
	[F_READ_COMM_CODE] [varchar](100)  NULL,
	[F_READ_COMM_FREE] [varchar](100)  NULL,
	[Q_PDE_HIGH_LOW] [varchar](100)  NULL,
	[Q_PDE_REEN_COUN] [varchar](100)  NULL,
	[F_PDE_AUXI_READ] [varchar](100)  NULL,
	[D_METE_READ_UPDA] [varchar](100)  NULL,
	[_DLRawZoneTimeStamp] [datetime]  NULL,
	[year] [varchar](4)  NULL,
	[month] [varchar](2)  NULL,
	[day] [varchar](2)  NULL
)
WITH
(
	DISTRIBUTION = HASH ( [N_PROP] ),
	CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
)
GO

--------
CREATE TABLE estih(  
	AEDAT varchar(100) ,
	AENAM varchar(100) ,
	AUTOEND varchar(100) ,
	ERDAT varchar(100) ,
	ERNAM varchar(100) ,
	EXTRACT_DATETIME varchar(100) ,
	EXTRACT_RUN_ID bigint ,
	INDEXNR bigint ,
	MANDT varchar(100) ,
	PRUEFGR varchar(100) ,
	ZWZUART bigint ,
	_DLRawZoneTimeStamp datetime ,
	year varchar(12) ,
	month varchar(12) ,
	day varchar(12) 
)  

-------
--drop table sapisu_ehauisu
CREATE TABLE sapisu_ehauisu(  
	[/SAPCE/IURU_IED] varchar(100),
	[/SAPCE/IURU_IEDO] varchar(100),
	COUNC varchar(100),
	CRM_GUID varchar(100),
	EXTRACT_DATETIME varchar(100),
	EXTRACT_RUN_ID bigint,
	HAUS varchar(100),
	MANDT varchar(100),
	REGIOGROUP varchar(100),
	REGIOGROUP_PERM varchar(100),
	REGPOLIT varchar(100),
	_DLRawZoneTimeStamp datetime,
	year varchar(4),
	month varchar(2),
	day varchar(2)
)

--select count(*) from sapisu_ehauisu

--drop table sapisu_0bp_cat_text
create table sapisu_0bp_cat_text (
	EXTRACT_DATETIME varchar(100),
	EXTRACT_RUN_ID bigint,
	KEY1 varchar(100),
	LANGU varchar(100),
	ODQ_CHANGEMODE varchar(100),
	ODQ_ENTITYCNTR bigint,
	TXTLG varchar(100),
	_DLRawZoneTimeStamp datetime,
	year varchar(4),
	month varchar(2),
	day varchar(2)
)

select * from sapisu_0bp_cat_text

create table access_z309_tpropmeter (
	N_PROP varchar(100),
	N_PROP_METE varchar(100),
	N_METE_READ_ROUT varchar(100),
	C_METE_TYPE varchar(100),
	C_METE_READ_FREQ varchar(100),
	C_METE_GRID_LOCA varchar(100),
	C_READ_INST_NUM1 varchar(100),
	C_READ_INST_NUM2 varchar(100),
	F_METE_ADDI_DESC varchar(100),
	F_METE_ROUT_PREP varchar(100),
	F_METE_WARN_NOTE varchar(100),
	D_METE_FIT varchar(100),
	N_METE_READ_SEQU varchar(100),
	C_METE_POSI_STAT varchar(100),
	C_METE_CHAN_REAS varchar(100),
	N_METE_CHAN_ADVI varchar(100),
	D_METE_REMO varchar(100),
	F_METE_CONN varchar(100),
	N_METE_MAKE varchar(100),
	D_PROP_METE_UPDA varchar(100),
	C_METE_CLAS varchar(100),
	C_METE_CATE varchar(100),
	C_METE_GROU varchar(100),
	C_METE_READ_LOCA varchar(100),
	T_METE_SERV varchar(100),
	_DLRawZoneTimeStamp datetime,
	year varchar(4),
	month varchar(2),
	day varchar(2)
)

select count(*) from access_z309_tpropmeter

--------------------

create table access_z309_tmeterreading(
	N_PROP varchar(100),
	N_PROP_METE varchar(100),
	N_METE_READ varchar(100),
	C_METE_READ_TOLE varchar(100),
	C_METE_READ_TYPE varchar(100),
	C_METE_READ_CONS varchar(100),
	C_METE_READ_STAT varchar(100),
	C_METE_CANT_READ varchar(100),
	C_PDE_READ_METH varchar(100),
	Q_METE_READ varchar(100),
	D_METE_READ varchar(100),
	T_METE_READ_TIME varchar(100),
	Q_METE_READ_CONS varchar(100),
	Q_METE_READ_DAYS varchar(100),
	F_READ_COMM_CODE varchar(100),
	F_READ_COMM_FREE varchar(100),
	Q_PDE_HIGH_LOW varchar(100),
	Q_PDE_REEN_COUN varchar(100),
	F_PDE_AUXI_READ varchar(100),
	D_METE_READ_UPDA varchar(100),
	_DLRawZoneTimeStamp datetime,
	year varchar(4),
	month varchar(2),
	day varchar(2)
)

select count(*) from access_z309_tmeterreading
